98092.name: Lifetime Discretionary Hours - 1880
98092.description: Discretionary hours exclude hours used for sleep, meals and hygiene.

source.name: Fogel (2000)
source.dataPublishedBy: Fogel, Robert W. 2000. The Fourth Great Awakening and the Future of Egalitarianism. Chicago, IL and London: University Of Chicago Press.

98093.name: Lifetime Work Hours  - 1880
98093.description: Work hours include paid work, travel to and from work, and household chores.
